channel.title: Posts on Ben Overmyer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ben Overmyer

item.title: Adding Blog Here
item.description: I’m starting to use Hugo for blogging now. I might move all of the content currently on Pathfinder over to here, if it works as well as I hope it does. Also, I’m now hosting this site on Netlify, instead of deploying it myself to a VPS. This makes things much easier from a content management perspective.
